batchLimit.serverEnforcedMessage: You've reached the processing limit for your plan. You processed <currentCount>{currentCountValue}</currentCount> images, but your plan allows a maximum of <limit>{limitValue}</limit> images per hour.
batchLimit.clientEnforcedMessage: You tried to add {attempted} image{plural, plural, one {} other {s}, but your plan allows a maximum of {limit} image{limitPlural, plural, one {} other {s} in the queue.
batchLimit.freeUserMessage: Free users can process 1 image at a time. Upgrade to unlock higher batch limits and process multiple images.
batchLimit.securityMessage: This is a security measure to prevent abuse. The limit will reset in approximately 1 hour. Upgrade your plan for higher limits.
